ComicInfo.Summary:
Bruttenholm and Sandhu reach the site of the Nazis' occult activity, where the shadowy ''Master'' himself is about to complete his occult experiment.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|-----------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Mike Huddleston | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Michael Kaluta | 2 |
